|brand = SMC |model = SMC7004WFW |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = B11 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = HEDACC7004WFW |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Conexant;; |cpu1modelfull = <!-- CPU1 Full chip info --> |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- CPU1 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;TE28F160C3BA90; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = ICSI;IS42S16400-7T; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = <!-- true, --> |eth1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth2chip = Kendin;KS8737; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E8050;88E8050-RJJ, T08635.1, 0123 ATP; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = SuperTask!;;;
|exp_if_types = PCMCIA (16-bit) |exp_pcmcia_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = b
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = WG3004-17 |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = default |defaultssid_regex = ^default$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Accton |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/01/2002 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Wistron NeWeb EP2 |rad1modif = PCMCIA (16-bit) |rad1chip1 = Harris;HFA3841;HFA3841CN, 0049S 4458440, LUC 1257H; |rad1chip2 = Intersil;HFA3861B; |rad1chip3 = Intersil;HFA3683A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MADE IN TAIWAN R. O.C." and "P/N: 142004-404 REV: 01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"48.EP201.00A" and "WS80100C 01/13" is silkscreened on the '''Acer''' / '''Wistron NeWeb''' wireless module.
Per the [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/ '''HRI'''], this device is using '''Supertask''' as its OS.
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC sample manual.
The power supply shown in the FCC external photos is a '''DVE''' DV-91MX (120VAC ~ 60Hz -> 9VDC, 1.0A).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
